tags.name: trash
tags.description: Provides access to the collective trash.

tags.name: share
tags.description: Provides access to collective and page shares.

tags.name: page
tags.description: Provides access to pages of a collective.

tags.name: page_trash
tags.description: Provides access to page trash of a collective.

tags.name: template
tags.description: Provides access to template pages of a collective.

tags.name: collective_user_settings
tags.description: Provides access to user settings for a specific collective.

tags.name: session
tags.description: Provides access to collectives user sessions. Sessions are used to track active users/clients in a collective, e.g. to notify about updates.

tags.name: settings
tags.description: Provides access to the following user settings used by the collectives app. - user_folder: Path where collectives are mounted in user home directory.

tags.name: public_collective
tags.description: Provides access to public collective and page shares.

tags.name: public_page
tags.description: Provides access to pages of a public collective/page share.

tags.name: public_page_trash
tags.description: Provides access to page trash of a public collective share.

tags.name: public_template
tags.description: Provides access to template pages of a public collective share.
